# Mise en forme des données

## Chargement des packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ade4)
library(ggplot2)
library(vegan)
library(readxl)
```

## Téléchargement des matrices

```{r}
env_matrix <- read_excel("Additional_Files/Additional_File_05_metadados_paraR_coral.xlsx")
env_matrix <- column_to_rownames(env_matrix, var = "sample")
View(env_matrix)

res_matrix <- read_excel("Additional_Files/Additional_File_03_asv_otu5_paraR_coral.xlsx")
res_matrix <- column_to_rownames(res_matrix, var = "ASV")
View(res_matrix)

tax_matrix <- read_excel("Additional_Files/Additional_File_04_asv_tax5_paraR.xlsx")
tax_matrix <- column_to_rownames(tax_matrix, var = "ASV")
```

```{r}
res_matrix_t <- t(res_matrix)
tax_matrix_t <- t(tax_matrix)
```
